de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.utils

Interface GradientSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GradientImage

    public interface GradientSource
    Defines a class from which image gradients can be obtained. Implementations could be simply sobel-filtered images or canny edge processed images

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getLength(int x, int y)
      Returns the length of the gradient at pixel location x,y.
      double getTheta(int x, int y) 
      void setIp(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip)
      Initialize the GradientSource with this Processor

      • getLength

        double getLength(int x,
               int y)
        Returns the length of the gradient at pixel location x,y.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        Returns:
        Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy)

      • getTheta

        double getTheta(int x,
              int y)
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        Returns:
        Math.atan(dy / dx) or 0
